home.emergency_response_message: Thank you for responding to this emergency. We will contact you immediately with donation instructions.
home.appointment_reschedule_message: Your appointment has been rescheduled to {date} at {time}. You will receive a confirmation shortly.
home.reschedule_missing_info: Please select both a date and time for your new appointment.

explore.title: Blood Donation Campaigns
explore.subtitle: Find and join donation campaigns near you
explore.join_success_message: You have successfully registered for "{campaignTitle}". You will receive a notification with details.
explore.join_error_message: Unable to register for this campaign. Please try again.

donation.qr_subtitle: Show this QR code to staff at the donation center
donation.scan_instruction: Scan this QR code to view donor information
donation.questionnaire_subtitle: Please answer all questions honestly. This information helps ensure the safety of both donors and recipients.
donation.appointment_tab_description: Schedule your blood donation appointment at a hospital or blood bank near you

questions.donationCount: How many times have you donated blood?
questions.anyDifficulty: Did you have any difficulty during your last donation?
questions.medicalAdvice: Are you under medical supervision or taking any prescribed medications?
questions.readInformationLeaflet: Have you read and understood the blood donation information leaflet?
questions.medicalConditions: Do you have any of the following medical conditions?
questions.takingMedicines: Are you currently taking any medicines?
questions.anySurgery: Have you had any surgery or dental work in the past 4 months?
questions.workingLater: Are you planning to do any heavy work or exercise today?
questions.recentChildbirth: Have you given birth in the past 12 months?
questions.haveHepatitis: Have you ever had hepatitis (any type)?
questions.hadTyphoid: Have you had typhoid fever in the past 3 months?
questions.hadVaccination: Have you received any vaccinations in the past 4 weeks?
questions.tattoos: Have you had any tattoos or piercings in the past 12 months?
questions.haveImprisonment: Have you been in prison or detention in the past 12 months?
questions.travelledAbroad: Have you travelled outside Sri Lanka in the past 3 months?
questions.partnerTravelledAbroad: Has your sexual partner travelled outside Sri Lanka in the past 3 months?
questions.receivedBlood: Have you received a blood transfusion in the past 12 months?
questions.partnerReceivedBlood: Has your sexual partner received a blood transfusion in the past 12 months?
questions.hadMalaria: Have you had malaria in the past 3 years?
questions.hasDengue: Have you had dengue fever in the past 6 months?
questions.hadLongFever: Have you had any fever lasting more than 2 days in the past month?
questions.hadChickenPox: Have you had chicken pox in the past 4 weeks?
questions.hadMeasles: Have you had measles in the past 4 weeks?
questions.hadMumps: Have you had mumps in the past 4 weeks?
questions.hadRubella: Have you had rubella in the past 4 weeks?
questions.hadDiarrhoea: Have you had diarrhea in the past 2 weeks?
questions.hadtoothExtraction: Have you had any tooth extraction in the past 1 week?
questions.bookAspirin: Have you taken aspirin in the past 3 days?
questions.tookAntibiotics: Have you taken antibiotics in the past 1 week?
questions.tookOtherMedicine: Have you taken any other medication in the past 1 week?
questions.knowledgeAgent: Do you have knowledge of being exposed to any infectious disease?
questions.highRisk: Are you in any high-risk category for infectious diseases?
questions.feverLymphNode: Do you currently have fever or swollen lymph nodes?
questions.hadWeightLoss: Have you had unexplained weight loss recently?
questions.receiveBlood: Has your partner received blood transfusion?

descriptions.anyDifficulty: Please describe the difficulty you experienced
descriptions.travelledAbroad: International travel within the last 3 months
descriptions.receivedBlood: Blood transfusion within the last 12 months
descriptions.recentIllnesses: In the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following?
descriptions.pastIllnesses: Have you ever had any of the following illnesses?
descriptions.medicalConditionsHeader: Do you have or have you ever had any of the following medical conditions?

donation.declaration_required_error: You must accept the donor declaration before submitting.
donation.submit_error: Failed to submit form. Please try again.

steps.declaration_label: I hereby declare that the above information is true and complete.

activities.subtitle: Track your donation history and status
activities.no_activities_subtitle: Your donation history will appear here

profile.title: Profile
profile.logout_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to logout?
profile.logout_message: Are you sure you want to logout?
profile.camp_organizer_message: Would you like to apply to become a camp organizer? This will allow you to create and manage blood donation camps.
profile.application_success_message: Your application to become a camp organizer has been submitted. We will review it and get back to you soon.
profile.logout_error: Failed to logout. Please try again.

campaign.screening_passed_msg: has been marked as passed screening
campaign.screening_failed_msg: has been marked as failed screening
campaign.invalid_qr_msg: This QR code is not valid for attendance marking
campaign.camera_permission_msg: Please grant camera permission to scan QR codes for attendance marking
campaign.align_qr: Align the QR code within the frame above to mark participant attendance
campaign.screening_question: Did this participant pass the screening?
campaign.campaign_submitted_msg: Your campaign has been submitted for approval. You will be notified once it has been reviewed by the blood bank administration.
campaign.approval_info: Your campaign will be reviewed by blood bank administrators before approval. You will receive a notification once the review is complete.
campaign.fill_required_fields: Please fill in all required fields correctly.
campaign.submit_error: Failed to submit campaign. Please try again.
